main event: A UFO sighting involving a round white light observed in the vicinity of the Big Dipper in Indianapolis, Indiana on May 19, 1964.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 15 minutes and included the object disappearing gradually,The object moved in an easterly direction from a high elevation to lower elevations,Other reports mention an object observed near Bedford, Ohio with red and green lights flashing,Several men, including a deputy sheriff, confirmed seeing an object 20-30 feet in diameter that moved slowly and then accelerated quickly,Historical documentation from Project Blue Book indicates multiple sightings around the same time.
sighted object: one round white light in the sky
witness description: Reported by Lt. Carroll L. Henderson, USAF
